sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import {faStar} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import {AppendToday} from '../Utils/AppendDay' const CompetitionHeader = ({fixtures}) => { const Content = () => fixtures.length && fixtures.map((fixture, index) => { return (
{fixture.league.country} {fixture.league.name} - {fixture.league.round} {AppendToday()}
00:00
{fixture.teams.home}
{fixture.goals.home ? fixture.goals.home : '?'}
{fixture.teams.away}
{fixture.goals.away ? fixture.goals.away : '?'}
) }) if (!fixtures.length) return null; return } export default CompetitionHeader
